com.linkedin.parseq

Class ActionTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linkedin.parseq.promise.DelegatingPromise<T>
      • com.linkedin.parseq.BaseTask<java.lang.Void>
        • com.linkedin.parseq.ActionTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancellable, Promise<java.lang.Void>, Task<java.lang.Void>
    Deprecated. 
    As of 2.0.0, replaced by Task.action.

    @Deprecated
public class ActionTask
extends BaseTask<java.lang.Void>
    A Task that runs a Runnable and returns no value. Use Tasks.action(String, Runnable) to create instances of this class.
    Author:
    Chris Pettitt (cpettitt@linkedin.com), Jaroslaw Odzga (jodzga@linkedin.com)
    See Also:
    Task.action
